H0.text: In Roman mythology, on which part of the body were talaria worn. Ankle

H1.text: In Roman mythology, on which part of the body were talaria worn. Knee

H2.text: In Roman mythology, on which part of the body were talaria worn. Calf

H3.text: In Roman mythology, on which part of the body were talaria worn. Foot

A4.text: In certain images, the wings spring directly from the ankles.
